## TogglePatternDelayed

### TogglePatternDelayed Globally
```
Globally, it is always the case that if "Q" holds then "R" toggles "S" at most "5" time units later
```
```
Counterexample: true;⌈(Q && R)⌉;⌈!R⌉ ∧ ℓ ≥ 5;⌈(!R && !S)⌉;true
```
